thread.title: Jimmer Fredette waived by Spurs
thread.title_full: Jimmer Fredette waived by Spurs | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: The Sports Xchange
title: Jimmer Fredette waived by Spurs
text:
Jimmer Fredette was waived by the San Antonio Spurs.
Fredette, 26, was the 10th overall pick in 2011 with the Sacramento Kings and bounced from the Chicago Bulls to the New Orleans Pelicans before signing with San Antonio this summer.
He was the first player released from the Spurs' training camp roster. He made 2 of 10 shot attempts with the Spurs in three preseason games.
NBA rules require rosters be reduced to 15 by Monday.
